Package DBHelper

Class BooksLMS

java.lang.Object
DBHelper.DBHelper
DBHelper.BooksLMS
public class BooksLMS extends DBHelper
This class handles database operations for the BooksLMS table in the SQLite database.

      private String prepareSQL(String fields, String whatField, String whatValue, String sortField, String sort)
      Prepares an SQL query string.
      Parameters:
      fields - the fields to select
      whatField - the field for the where clause
      whatValue - the value for the where clause
      sortField - the field to sort by
      sort - the sort order
      Returns:
      the prepared SQL query string

      Inserts a new book into the database.
      Parameters:
      Title - the title of the book
      Author - the author of the book
      Genre - the genre of the book
      Barcode - the barcode of the book
      Status - the status of the book
      DueDate - the due date of the book

      whatField - the field for the where clause

      sortField - the field to sort by
      sort - the sort order
